item.title: Automating AWS Workflows
item.description: This article shows you how to use AWS CLI programmatically to automate your deployment process. We’ll upload assets to S3 (specifying their ACL and caching behavior) and invalidate CloudFront cache. Starting with a local shell script, we conclude with plugging the script into our CircleCI workflow. It may be especially useful if you’re using Rails with Webpacker, but no experience with Rails is required. My latest Shopify app Robin PRO renders image galleries on customer stores.
